GOD.content: every text consigned to public space can become a literary object [Schreber]

F.content: re: Schreber’s documents, original must be marked by fiction; p. xxviii “work of art”; p. xxxiii Abraham: privileged patient, the poem, the work of art, not the artist

POS.content: Derrida fractures hermetic closure that shelters question of writing from psychoanalysis, blinding psychoanalytic discourse from the textual scene

PS.content: to protect meaning against psychomedical reduction, criticism (aesthetic, literary, philosophical) always creates an example, a case, same result as the reduction
for criticism to make a case (of meaning or value) read essence into example
Artaud, very Schreberian > death through demiurge’s desire for body

CHM.content: no praise (éloge), by essence, except of reason [Freud could only have praised Schreber’s reason]
if madness is the absence of a work, any philosopher/speaking subject can only evoke madness in language of fiction or fiction of language

DST.content: désistance brings to light anoia, not to be confused w/ madness though it can resemble it > double bind btwn 2 madnesses: 1) one of disintalling 2) one of reason, defensive stiffening (crispation) in assistance [Kafka], imitation, identification > madness against madness

SPEC.content: from whichever end (bout) [i.e. pleasure or reality], it is death, inscribed but non-inscribable in structure, in process of structure—stricture: death already (déjà) life death

FV.content: Schreber: we all (women included) like naked women
psychoanalysis [Freud, Bonaparte] justifies crushing monotony of monosemic truth under heading Wiederholungszwang [i.e. Freud declaring sun another sublimated symbol of father]
